main event: An ex-Air Force pilot and others observed a vapor trail in the sky in Las Vegas, Nevada on October 8 or 9, 1947.
interesting points: The object producing the trail was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 1700-1800 mph,The trail was described as white and dissipated in fifteen to twenty minutes,The object made a 150Â° turn with a radius of five to fifteen miles,The visibility conditions were described as 'almost cloudless',The report speculated that the trail could have been caused by an ordinary aircraft despite its unusual characteristics.
sighted object: a vapor trail in the sky
witness description: an ex-Air Force pilot and others
